original_text: Then the third angel poured out his bowl on the rivers and on the springs of water. As a result, all the water became blood.
korean_text: 셋째 천사가 그 대접을 강과 물 근원에 쏟으매 피가 되더라

sentences.original_text: Then the third angel poured out his bowl on the rivers
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 세 번째 천사가 강 위에 그의 대접을 쏟았습니다

sentences.original_text: and on the springs of water
As a result, all the water became blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 모든 물이 피가 되었습니다
